mapper.select: SELECT gb.id, gb.name, gb.type, gb.type_id AS typeId, gb.unit, gb.amount, gb.num, gb.price, gb.create_date AS createDate, ct.`name` AS consumableName FROM goods_belong gb LEFT JOIN consumable_type ct ON ( ct.id = gb.type_id ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND gb.num = #{ num }

SELECT gb.id, gb.`name`, gb.type, gb.type_id AS typeId, gb.unit, gb.amount, gb.num, gb.price, gb.create_date AS createDate, ct.`name` AS consumableName, IFNULL( si.amount, 0 ) AS amountStock FROM goods_belong gb LEFT JOIN consumable_type ct ON ( ct.id = gb.type_id ) LEFT JOIN stock_info si ON ( si.`name` = gb.`name` ) AND si.is_in = 0 WHERE 1 = 1 AND gb.num = #{ num }
